00031 Entree& Ch_front_input_uniforme::readOn(Entree& is)
00032 {
00033   sous_zone_ok=false;
00034   read(is);
00035   mon_pb->addInputField(*this);
00036   return is;
00037 }

00059 // Description
00060 // By default initializes to zero.
00061 int Ch_front_input_uniforme::initialiser(double temps, const Champ_Inc_base& inco)
00062 {
00063   if (!Champ_front_instationnaire_base::initialiser(temps,inco))
00064     return 0;
00065   for(int i=0; i<les_valeurs->nb_cases(); i++)
00066     {
00067       DoubleTab& val=les_valeurs[i].valeurs();
00068       int nbcomp=val.dimension(1);
00069       if (initial_value_.size_array()==0)
00070         val=0;
00071       else
00072         for (int c=0; c<nbcomp; c++)
00073           val(0,c)=initial_value_(c);
00074     }
00075   return 1;
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Description
00079 // Provides afield with a dummy geometry, a name, a time interval,
00080 // components, and no field ownership.
00081 void Ch_front_input_uniforme::getTemplate(TrioField& afield) const
00082 {
00083 
00084   afield.dummy_geom();
00085   afield.setName(le_nom().getChar());
00086 
00087   afield._time1=mon_pb->presentTime();
00088   afield._time2=mon_pb->futureTime();
00089 
00090   afield._nb_field_components=nb_comp();
00091 }
00092 
00093 // Description
00094 // Uses the first value in afield as uniform value, regardless of geometry.
00095 void Ch_front_input_uniforme::setValue(const TrioField& afield)
00096 {
00097   for (int i=1; i<les_valeurs->nb_cases(); i++)
00098     Champ_Input_Proto::setValueOnTab(afield,les_valeurs[i].valeurs());
00099   Gpoint(afield._time1,afield._time2);
00100 }
